name: ccRobot
author: ccRobot

sections.description:
Need a simple and easy-to-use virtual assistant plugin for your WordPress website?

Look no further, ccRobot.ai’s virtual assistant and Live Chat widget is the ultimate solution to help your business manage customer inquiries and automate repetitive tasks. NO coding is required!

Overview

Our plugin is designed to help business owners and website managers save time and improve their customer experience (CX) by providing instant responses and assistance. With our plugin, you can easily manage customer inquiries and automate repetitive tasks, all while providing a personal touch to your customer interactions.

The plugin comes with a chatbot that can handle customer inquiries 24/7, providing instant responses and redirecting inquiries to the appropriate department or person. This chatbot uses cx automation technology to provide personalized responses based on customer preferences, helping to improve customer satisfaction and loyalty.

Our plugin is also cost-effective, and scalable, allowing you to easily manage customer inquiries as your business grows without the need to hire additional staff.

With our Virtual Assistant and Live Chat Plugin for WordPress, you can enjoy the benefits of a live chat and chatbot solution at a fraction of the cost, and improve your customer service, helping your business grow.

In addition to our livechat and chatbot capabilities, our plugin also provides omni-channel assistance to customers. This means that you can provide support to your customers via their preferred channels, including WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, SMS, Phone and many more. With our plugin, you can ensure that your customers receive the support they need, when they need it, no matter how they prefer to communicate. This feature helps your business to reach customers where they are and increase the chances of conversion and satisfaction.

Our plugin makes it easy for you to manage all of your customer interactions in one place, regardless of the channel they prefer. This allows you to provide a seamless customer experience and improve customer satisfaction. With our plugin, you can ensure that your customers have a positive experience with your business, no matter how they choose to communicate with you.

ccRobot.ai is powered by artificial intelligence and machine learning which makes it possible to improve service quality, efficiency, and effectiveness by automating client interactions in a personalized manner that can be seamlessly added to your website.
sections.installation:
You can find step by step instructions for signing up and installing ccRobot.ai onto your WordPress website here

Contact us at info@korahlimited.com if you have any questions!

short_description: ccRobot adds a virtual assistant widget seamlessly to your website. Switch effortlessly between chatbot and live chat. No coding necessary.

screenshots.caption: ccRobot.ai Chatbot Plugin - Provide 24/7 support to your customers.
Customers can securely complete and make orders directly through the live chat window.
Observe and Manage Conversations - Manage all of your customer interactions all in one place.
Customize Your Chat Widget - Personalize the widget style to match your company branding.
Support Your Customers In Their Preferred Channels - Provide support to your customers no matter how they choose to communicate with you.
